description: Empetrum Peak is a small mountain northwest of the Black Tusk in Garibaldi Park. Its location gives a unique perspective of the Black Tusk in all seasons. Follow the trail to Helm Creek Campground, then make your way through the meadows, cross Helm Creek, and aim for the col between the Black Tusk and Empetrum Peak. Head up towards the false peak. Once on the ridge, Empetrum Peak is the farthest and highest peak on the ridge.
directions: Follow Cheakamus FSR from Function Junction to parking lot.
title: Empetrum Peak
